# Register for Google Earth Engine


```{r}
#| echo: false
i <- 0

cnt <- function() {
  i <<- i+1
  paste("Step",i)
}

```


## `r cnt()`

Go to <https://code.earthengine.google.com/register> and Login with your Google Account

## `r cnt()`

![Accept the User Agreement and confirm](en/step-01.png){#fig-step-01 .column-page}


## `r cnt()`

![Click on "Create new project"](en/step-02.png){#fig-step-02 .column-page}




## `r cnt()`

![Choose a project name (e.g. `adls-datalab`). Choosing an Organisation is not necessary.](en/step-03.png){#fig-step-03 .column-page}

## `r cnt()`

![Choose *See if you are eligible for non-commercial use*](en/step-04.png){#fig-step-04 .column-page}

## `r cnt()`

![Select *Public or private academic institution* as the organisation type](en/step-05.png){#fig-step-05 .column-page}

## `r cnt()`

![Enter *ZHAW* as the name of the institution, *Scientific research* as the use and *How has the forest in lenk recovered* as the research question and *Regional* as the geographic scope of the project](en/step-06.png){#fig-step-06 .column-page}

## `r cnt()`

![Choose *No* to the question on whether you've previously published work on this topic](en/step-07.png){#fig-step-07 .column-page}

## `r cnt()`

![On the question "Will you use Earth Engine for any of the following?" you can choose *Scientific reserach* as well as *Forestry* from the drop down](en/step-08.png){#fig-step-08 .column-page}

## `r cnt()`

![In the popup concerning API, choose *Enable*](en/step-09.png){#fig-step-09 .column-page}

## `r cnt()`

![You should now see that your project is registered for non commercial use](en/step-10.png){#fig-step-10 .column-page}

## `r cnt()`

![Now, you can visit <https://code.earthengine.google.com>](en/step-11.png){#fig-step-11 .column-page}

## `r cnt()`

![Here, choose the project you created in the previous steps](en/step-12.png){#fig-step-12 .column-page}

## `r cnt()`

![Once you see the the welcome popup, you're done!](en/step-13.png){#fig-step-13 .column-page}
